snippet.title: Tears of Avia - Trailer
snippet.description:
Support us on patreon: https://www.patreon.com/coocoosqueaky

Introducing Tears of Avia, a turn based tactical roleplaying game that shakes up dull and linear skill systems, where crafting your strategy is just as key to success as battle itself.

Visit us at http://www.tearsofavia.com/
